data.text:
New and very clean hotel. Location is ideal for vacations on the beach and trips to the city.
The staff was very friendly and attentive. Alice's team was particularly accommodating.
The breakfast is also remarkable. You can choose food and drinks from the cart, which are brought to the table by the staff. No stress and food waste with a buffet.
The only negatic point was the club with loud music near the hotel, which played until the early hours of the morning. you couldn't hear anything when the window was closed.
data.title: Nice hotel with friendly staffs

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 55raimundb,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai! We're delighted to hear that you found our hotel to be new, clean, and ideally located for both beach relaxation and city exploration.

It's wonderful to know that our friendly and attentive staff, particularly Alice's team, made a positive impression on you.

We're thrilled that you enjoyed our unique A la carte breakfast service. We designed it with our guests' convenience and satisfaction in mind, aiming to minimize stress and food waste often associated with traditional buffet setups.

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the loud music from the nearby club. We understand how this could have affected your overall experience, and we will certainly explore possible solutions to address this issue and ensure a more peaceful stay for our guests in the future.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us. We can't wait to have you back for more sun, sea, and city fun!

Warm regards, 

Marketing Department
Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai
owner_response.author: Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai

data.text: It was quite an unexpected nice gesture from the hotel. I missed my flight and didnt use the first night. instead of this the hotel presented me an upgraded room and a late check out. Overall it was the best experience I ve had. And I do travel a lot!
data.title: greatest stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Liza S,
 
Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful experience with us! We are delighted to hear that despite missing your flight and not being able to use the first night of your reservation, you were pleased with the unexpected gesture of an upgraded room and a late check-out.

We understand that travel plans can sometimes be unpredictable, and we are thrilled that we could make your stay more comfortable and enjoyable under such circumstances. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and it's heartening to know that this was the best experience you've had, especially considering your frequent travels.

Your kind words and recognition of our efforts mean a great deal to us. They inspire our team to continue going above and beyond to ensure our guests' satisfaction.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another outstanding experience in the future!

Best regards,

Marketing Department
Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai
owner_response.author: Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai

data.text:
This hotel is a small oasis boasting the closest proximity to the sea I've encountered in Dubai. The rooms are  spacious, offering spectacular views. Everything feels new and functions seamlessly. The modern decor exhibits a designer's touch, and the common areas are cozy. The bar and restaurant are exceptional, especially the outdoor section. Although the gym is well-equipped, I would appreciate more upper body training equipment. However, all these amenities would be meaningless without the exceptionally professional, friendly, and well-trained staff who make you feel valued. In my numerous professional trips to Dubai, I've experimented with different hotels, yet in recent times, I've ceased my search and consistently booked with Hyatt Centric.

During my last stay, I inadvertently left three credit cards in the room. The hotel promptly notified me and efficiently arranged for the return of the cards, handling the situation with utmost professionalism, having regard to  the fact that this was a sensitive financial issue.

I will certainly book this hotel again and again.
data.title: A small hotel with strong identity

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Globinious, 

We are genuinely grateful for your thorough and positive review. Your words are truly appreciated and serve as a testament to the dedication of our team to provide exceptional service and experiences to our guests.

We're thrilled that you found our hotel to be a small oasis with its close proximity to the sea, spacious rooms, and stunning views. It's delightful to hear that you enjoyed the modern decor, seamless functionality, and cozy ambiance of our common areas, as well as the exceptional offerings of our bar and restaurant, especially the outdoor section.

Your feedback regarding the gym equipment is duly noted, and we will certainly consider ways to enhance the fitness amenities for our guests.

We take great pride in the professionalism, friendliness, and training of our staff, and we're pleased that their efforts made your stay memorable. It's wonderful to hear that we were able to promptly and efficiently handle the sensitive issue of your misplaced credit cards, demonstrating our commitment to guest satisfaction and service excellence.

We're honored that you have chosen to consistently book with Hyatt Centric for your professional trips to Dubai, and we eagerly anticipate the opportunity to welcome you back time and time again. Thank you once again for your kind words and loyalty!

Best regards, 

Marketing Department
Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai
owner_response.author: Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai

data.text: Staff members is very friendly recommend to any one visiting Dubai. Hotel have a nice view to sea side and to the city center like Bruno khelifa . Room very clean every day .the food need to change the menu we stayed 5 nights the menu .
data.title: Best place to stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear nbiboys,

Thank you for your fantastic review! We're thrilled to hear that you had such a positive experience with us. Our team takes great pride in providing friendly and attentive service to all our guests. We're delighted that you enjoyed the stunning views of the sea and the city center, as well as the cleanliness of your room.

We appreciate your suggestion about the food menu and truly value your input. Your feedback is important to us and we will take your comments into consideration. Our culinary team is dedicated to crafting a menu that reflects the highest standards of quality and taste, offering fresh, homemade, and delicious meals to our guests. We continually strive to exceed expectations and provide a greater variety and freshness for our guests.

Warm regards,

Marketing Department
Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai
owner_response.author: Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai

data.text: My recent stay at the Hyatt Centric Jumeirah was nothing short of exceptional. Not only was the location and hotel decor very inviting, the staff went above and beyond to ensure the stay was as enjoyable and therefore as memorable as possible. Highly recommend!
data.title: Premium quality in every way

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mark_RSA87, 

Your glowing review truly warms our hearts! It's fantastic to hear that your recent stay at the Hyatt Centric Jumeirah exceeded your expectations in every aspect. We take great pride in offering premium quality experiences, and your kind words affirm that our efforts are paying off.

From our inviting location to the carefully curated hotel decor, we aim to create a memorable atmosphere for our guests. It's wonderful to hear that you found everything to your liking.

Our team works tirelessly to ensure that each guest's stay is not just enjoyable, but truly unforgettable. We're thrilled that our staff's dedication made a positive impact on your experience.

Thank you immensely for your high recommendation! We can't wait for the chance to welcome you back and create yet another exceptional stay for you in the future. 

Kindest regards, 

Marketing Department
Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai
owner_response.author: Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai
